long_description: The Pelican i1015 case offers water resistant, crushproof and dustproof protection for your iPhone(TM), iPod touch(R), Blackberry(R) and other smart phones. Compatible with Blackberry Bold, Curve, Storm and Pearl; MyTouch 3G; G1 Nokia 5800, 5530, E63, E71, E71x, E75 and N97 Mini, N79 and N78; Motorola Droid and Cliq. Fitted rubber liner cradles your music player to protect it from damage. Rubber liner doubles as O-ring seal to keep moisture and dust from getting inside. Easy-opening, lockable latch releases lid; mesh pocket under lid helps organize small items like earbuds. Stainless-steel hardware delivers lasting protection from corrosion. Earphones plug into protective right-angle jack on side for no-fuss listening; built-in cable manager holds earphones and cables. Exterior of the Pelican i1015 case features a carabiner clip and strap attachment point.
short_description: The Pelican i1015 case offers water resistant, crushproof and dustproof protection for your iPhone(TM), iPod touch(R), Blackberry(R) and other smart phones.
